title: Richard Sherman and Patrick Peterson discuss rivalry, respect, Hall of Fame, state of CB position, covering Calvin Johnson and more
description:
Download and follow All Things Covered featuring 8-time Pro Bowler Patrick Peterson and 2-time Super Bowl champion (and friend of Pick Six) Bryant McFadden. You can find All Things Covered on Apple Podcasts, Spotify and wherever else podcasts are found. 

On this long-awaited episode, Richard Sherman joins an old rival Patrick Peterson for a wide-ranging conversation on the evolution of their careers, the state of the CB position now and what the future holds. First, Sherm and Pat P discuss the different parts of their relationship including why things were a bit rocky to start and how they got better. Next, Sherman focuses on his ongoing beef with Darrelle Revis and why that still exists to this day. The guys chat about another relationship that has grown and that is with Tom Brady and how TB12 compares to another one of Richard's old QBs, Russell Wilson. What does Russ have to accomplish in Denver for it to be considered a success? Our esteemed guest recalls what it was like seeing Antonio Brown walk off the field during a game last year, before addressing the state of the CB position and his thoughts on the Hall of Fame. Is Richard Sherman done playing in the NFL? Hear the exclusive answer from the man himself! We hop into superlatives where Sherman explains what made Calvin Johnson so tough to cover, why the 2011 draft class is the best ever and his favorite Marshawn Lynch story. Seriously, you don't want to miss this one. 
(1:30) Pat P and Sherm's history
(10:45) Beef with Darrelle Revis
(15:00) Relationship with Tom Brady
(17:00) Tom Brady vs. Russell Wilson
(21:15) Coaches in common
(24:30) Antonio Brown's walkoff
(30:00) State of the CB position
(35:45) HOF thoughts
(38:30) Possibility of NFL return?
(40:15) Immaculate Deflection
(42:15) Superlatives

'All Things Covered' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Visit the All Things Covered YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/allthingscovered
Get 20% off All Things Covered merch at the CBS Sports Store: https://store.cbssports.com/collections/all-things-covered?utm_source=podcast-apple-com&utm_medium=web&utm_campaign=buy-our-merch&utm_content=all-things-covered-collection
You can listen to All Things Covered on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the All Things Covered podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the All Things Covered podcast."
Like our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/AllThingsCoveredPod
Follow Pat on Instagram and Twitter
Follow BMac on Instagram and Twitter
Follow All Things Covered on Instagram and Twitter 
Produced by: @E_DeBerardinis
